row.abstract: Abbati monachisque Vallis-laureae praecipit, ne archiepiscopo Tarraconensi, apostolicae sedis legato, neve episcopo Barcinonensi obediant, donec finium controversia disceptetur. Marca Marca Hisp. p. 1351, Aguirre Conc. V. 85, Mansi XXI. 1064, Villanueva Viage litter. XX. 253, Migne 200 p. 509.
